works.description: Eco-friendly luxury yachting is one of the newest travel trends among the super rich, and the latest one that aims to go green on the blue waters comes from Aras Kazar of Aras Kazar Design. The 67-meter eco concept christened Blue Dream II Green emphasizes on the use of solar panel technology. The yacht’s electric system is supported by the solar panel installed on the roof, and it meets 100 percent of the yacht’s electricity needs. Kazar has used his 10 years of know-how of the superyacht industry to create a concept inspired by the desire to see more environmentally friendly vessels in the market. He says…
